i need to set unity 2d as default deskto: at the login screen, click the "gear icon", then "unity-2d"
unity-2d will now be the default shell for that account
the gear icon should be next to your name
is there an "options" button on your screen?
below the username box on the login screen?
ok, chose "Unity 2d (previous)" and then log in
once you pick it, it should remain the default for that account I believe (it does in lightdm and gdm)
if it doesn't, there may be a checkbox for "set as default" or "save settings" or somesuch
is unity 2d not logging in, or can you just not get it to be the default?
is unity-2d not working at all, or just not staying as the default?
alright. since it appears to be a kdm issue (not saving the default) you'll probably have better luck asking in the #kubuntu channel.
you are however welcome to stay in #ubuntu and see if anyone here is familiar with kdm
